arts.sum: Bournemouth head coach Andoni Iraola is happy with his side's consistent level of performance as the Cherries defeat Southampton 3-1 at St Mary's.

arts.ttl: Bournemouth ease past Saints to boost Champions League hopes

Bournemouth manager Andoni Iraola is happy with his sides consistent level of performance as the Cherries defeat Southampton 1-3 at St Mary's stadium.

arts.ttl: Andoni Iraola eager to manage expectations at Bournemouth after Southampton win
arts.sum: Dango Ouattara, Ryan Christie and Marcus Tavernier were also on target for the Cherries.

arts.ttl: Bournemouth to compete with Bayern Munich for 25-year-old ace
arts.sum: Bournemouth are reportedly interested in signing the AS Roma goalkeeper Mile Svilar. The 25-year-old goalkeeper has a contract with the Italian club until 2027 and there have been rumours of a potential renewal. However, the Italian outfit have not been able to secure an agreement with the player yet. arts.sum: Southampton goalkeeper Gavin Bazunu has found himself ‘confronted with pressure’ after joining Standard Liege in the January transfer window. That’s according to Voetbalkrant, who cover the goalkeeper today as he looks to get back on track in Belgium.
